headerCard.title: Making a change, Together
headerCard.description: We believe that anyone has the power to make an impact: Through this platform we strive to create a place where people come together and work to change the world. This is PebbleWork.

main.joinCommunityDescription: Create an account in a few seconds and join our team of motivated individuals. You can also connect through Gmail and X/Twitter.
main.attendEventsDescription: Join forces, contribute, and collaborate with people as passionate and dedicated as you in making the right changes.
main.hostEventDescription: Having trouble finding a cause that truly resonates with you? Take the initiative by creating your own event.

heroCard.title: Become the change you wish to see in the world.
heroCard.description: Not only will you make a meaningful impact, you'll find a thriving, like-minded community that supports our mission to create a better world. Take the first step now. Enhancing your experience, we're excited to introduce Student Storeâ€”an innovative Algerian platform where students sell, buy, and exchange [...]. Your impact can go beyond borders, contributing to this movement of support and positive change. Follow this /link/ and discover a world of possibilities where everyone has the means to access what they need.
